item.title: SQL for Data Analytics: A Step-by-Step Guide
item.description:
SQL for Data Analytics: A Step-by-Step Guide

When working on data analytics projects using SQL, there are three main stages to consider: Data Warehousing, Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA), and Advanced Analytics. Each stage builds on the previous one, helping you develop a strong foundation in SQL and data-driven decision-making.

1️⃣ SQL Data Warehousing: Laying the Foundation

Before diving into analysis, it’s essential to organize and structure your data properly. SQL Data Warehousing is the backbone of any data analytics project, ensuring that raw data is transformed into a usable format.
